description: Configuration for Phase 2 Task 3 Learning Objectives Generation

_comments.critical_gap_threshold: Percentage of users in Scenario B to classify gap as CRITICAL (default: 60%)
_comments.significant_gap_threshold: Percentage of users in Scenario B to classify gap as SIGNIFICANT (default: 20%)
_comments.critical_competency_count: Number of critical gaps to trigger CRITICAL validation status (default: 3)
_comments.inadequate_gap_percentage: Percentage of competencies with gaps to mark strategies as INADEQUATE (default: 40%)

_comments.gap_weight: Weight for gap size in priority calculation (default: 40%)
_comments.role_weight: Weight for role criticality in priority calculation (default: 30%)
_comments.urgency_weight: Weight for user urgency (Scenario B %) in priority calculation (default: 30%)

_comments.maturity_threshold: Maturity level threshold for pathway selection (default: 3 = ROLE_BASED, <3 = TASK_BASED)
_comments.valid_competency_levels: Valid discrete competency levels for rounding

_comments.expert_development_patterns: Strategies that are classified as expert development (not gap-based)
_comments.use_case_insensitive_matching: Use case-insensitive partial string matching for classification
_comments._note: Expert strategies are processed with simple 2-way comparison without validation

_comments.use_validation: Skip validation layer for expert strategies (default: false)
_comments.comparison_type: Use simple 2-way comparison: current vs target (default: '2-way')
_comments.use_pmt_customization: Skip PMT customization for expert strategies (default: false)
_comments._rationale: Expert strategies target mastery level (6) for all competencies, causing 90-100% Scenario C and negative fit scores. They are strategic capability investments, not gap-based training.

_comments.ttl_hours: Time-to-live for cache entries in hours (default: 24, not yet implemented)
